threegpp.milenage

Class Milenage<B extends MilenageBuffer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • threegpp.milenage.Milenage<B>

  • public class Milenage<B extends MilenageBuffer>
extends java.lang.Object

    Milenage

    Milenage algorithm

    Implements all Milenage functions according 3GPP TS 35.206

    Since:
    07.02.16

      • Milenage

        public Milenage(byte[] OPc,
                javax.crypto.Cipher k,
                CConstants<B> cConstants,
                RConstants rConstants,
                MilenageBufferFactory<B> bufferFactory)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        OPc - Byte array containing previously calculated OPc value (OPc = OP⊕E[OP]K)
        k - Cipher representing the encryption key (K)
        cConstants - Block of C constants (C1...C5)
        rConstants - Block of R constants (R1...R5)
        bufferFactory - MilenageBufferFactory object for creating MilenageBuffer instances.

                byte[] c2,
                byte[] c3,
                byte[] c4,
                byte[] c5,
                RConstants rConstants,
                MilenageBufferFactory<B> bufferFactory)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        OPc - Byte array containing previously calculated OPc value (OPc = OP⊕E[OP]K)
        k - Cipher representing the encryption key (K)
        c1 - C1 constant represented as an array of bytes
        c2 - C2 constant represented as an array of bytes
        c3 - C3 constant represented as an array of bytes
        c4 - C4 constant represented as an array of bytes
        c5 - C5 constant represented as an array of bytes
        rConstants - Block of R constants (R1...R5)
        bufferFactory - MilenageBufferFactory object for creating MilenageBuffer instances.

        k - Cipher representing the encryption key (K)
        bufferFactory - MilenageBufferFactory object for creating MilenageBuffer instances.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateOPc

        public static <B extends MilenageBuffer> byte[] calculateOPc(byte[] op,
                                                             javax.crypto.Cipher k,
                                                             MilenageBufferFactory<B> factory)
        Creates OPc from OP and K

        OPC = OP ⊕ E[OP]K

        Type Parameters:
        B - The type used by MilenageBufferFactory implementation
        Parameters:
        op - Operator Variant Algorithm Configuration Field (128 bit)
        k - Cipher object representing the Subscriber Key
        Returns:
        Array of bytes representing calculated OPc value

      • f1All

        public java.util.Map<MilenageResult,byte[]> f1All(byte[] rand,
                                                  byte[] sqn,
                                                  byte[] amf)
        Calculates result of Milenage functions f1 and f1*

        Output of f1 = MAC-A, where MAC-A[0] .. MAC-A[63] = OUT1[0] .. OUT1[63]

        Output of f1* = MAC-S, where MAC-S[0] .. MAC-S[63] = OUT1[64] .. OUT1[127]

        Parameters:
        rand - Random value generated by network (RAND)
        sqn - A 48-bit SQN value
        amf - A 16-bit AMF value
        Returns:
        Map containing results of f1 and f1* with keys MilenageResult.MAC_A and MilenageResult.MAC_S accordingly.

      • f2f5

        public java.util.Map<MilenageResult,byte[]> f2f5(byte[] rand)
        Calculates result of Milenage functions f2 and f5

        Output of f2 = RES, where RES[0] .. RES[63] = OUT2[64] .. OUT2[127]

        Output of f5 = AK, where AK[0] .. AK[47] = OUT2[0] .. OUT2[47]

        Parameters:
        rand - Random value generated by the network (RAND)
        Returns:
        Map containing results of f2 and f5 with keys MilenageResult.RES and MilenageResult.AK accordingly.

      • f3

        public byte[] f3(byte[] rand)
        Calculates result of Milenage function f3

        Output of f3 = CK, where CK[0] .. CK[127] = OUT3[0] .. OUT3[127]

        Parameters:
        rand - Random value generated by the network (RAND)
        Returns:
        Buffer containing CK value

      • f4

        public byte[] f4(byte[] rand)
        Calculates result of Milenage function f4

        Output of f4 = IK, where IK[0] .. IK[127] = OUT4[0] .. OUT4[127]

        Parameters:
        rand - Random value generated by the network (RAND)
        Returns:
        Buffer containing IK value

      • f5Star

        public byte[] f5Star(byte[] rand)
        Calculates result of Milenage function f5*

        Output of f5* = AK, where AK[0] .. AK[47] = OUT5[0] .. OUT5[47]

        Parameters:
        rand - Random value generated by the network (RAND)
        Returns:
        Buffer containing resynch AK value

      • calculateAll

        public java.util.Map<MilenageResult,byte[]> calculateAll(byte[] rand,
                                                         byte[] sqn,
                                                         byte[] amf,
                                                         java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor)
                                                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                         java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Calculates all the Milenage function values.

        Calculation can be performed synchronously or asynchronously.

        Parameters:
        rand - Random value generated by the network (RAND)
        sqn - A 48-bit SQN value
        amf - A 16-bit AMF value
        executor - ExecutorService object to be used for calculations.
        Returns:
        Map containing results of f1, f1*, f2, f3, f4, f5, f5* marked with appropriate key from MilenageResult enum.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - can be thrown by the ExecutorService
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - can be thrown by the ExecutorService
